Company

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

Loading...

Name Code Current Share Price Created Date
{{ compdata.companyName }} {{ compdata.code }} {{ compdata.sharePrice | number:'1.5' }} {{ compdata.createdDate | date :'dd-MMM-yyyy' }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-comp-fetch-data', templateUrl: './comp-fetch-data.component.html' }) export class CompFetchDataComponent { public compfetchdata: Company[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string, router : Router ) { console.log(baseUrl); http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast/getcompany').subscribe(result => { console.log(result); this.compfetchdata = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } public goToNewComp() { } } interface Company { code: string; companyName: string; createdDate: Date; sharePrice: number; }
